title: New: The Weeknd’s Maida Vale session for BBC Radio 1
body:
It’s been a big old week for **The Weeknd**.

He got to meet **Jools Holland**, play a secret Londonn gig that almost no one got to see and between all that he played this rather marvelous Maida Vale session for **Zane Lowe**. Like I said, a big week…for the Weeknd.

Listen below. Via [Consequence of Sound](http://consequenceofsound.net/2012/11/listen-to-the-weeknds-first-ever-radio-session/).
